I would love to see some more biome related lands. Like land - Jungle. Taps for green, and ![Tap](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=tap&type=symbol) creatures with flying can't block creature without flying this turn.   
  
I'm sure something cool could be done alone those lines. They don't need to be super powerful, just super flavorful.

Posted By: SyntheticDreamer (9/20/2012 8:13:38 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@leomistico, read here: http://www.wizards.com/magic/magazine/Article.aspx?x=mtgcom/arcana/1643, I think it's kinda cool his art gets recognized even after his passing and I think this one in particular is a masterpiece.  
  
As far as the card, maybe wouldn't be competitive in today's standard but I still use it in Pauper, it can be really effective to stop up first striking annoyances with one toughness or make them think twice if there's a clear board and they've got some 1/1s they want to attack with, especially if they're utility creatures
posts.html:

Posted By: Sabisent (8/30/2012 5:24:48 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Oh I come from a [land](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=land), from a faraway place  
 Where the [caravan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=caravan) [camel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=camel)s roam  
 Where it's flat and immense  
 And the [heat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=heat) is intense  
 It's barbaric, but hey, it's [home](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=home)-  
  
  
 When the [wind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=wind)'s from the [East](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=East)  
 And the [Sun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sun)'s from the [West](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=West)  
 And the [sand](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=sand) in the [glass](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=glass) is right  
 Come on down  
 Stop on by  
 Hop a [carpet](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=carpet) and [fly](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=fly)  
 To another [Arabian](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arabian) [Night](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Night)!  
   
Arabian Nights!  
 Like Arabian days  
 More often than not  
 Are [hotter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=hotter) than [hot](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=hot)  
 In a lot of good ways-  
   
Arabian Nights  
 'Neath Arabian [moon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=moon)s  
 A [fool](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=fool) off his [guard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=guard)  
 Could [fall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=fall) and fall hard!  
 Out there on the [du](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=du)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
Oh I come from a land, from a faraway place
Where the caravan camels roam
Where it's flat and immense
And the heat is intense
It's barbaric, but hey, it's home-


When the wind's from the East
And the Sun's from the West
And the sand in the glass is right
Come on down
Stop on by
Hop a carpet and fly
To another Arabian Night!

Arabian Nights!
Like Arabian days
More often than not
Are hotter than hot
In a lot of good ways-

Arabian Nights
'Neath Arabian moons
A fool off his guard
Could fall and fall hard!
Out there on the du... (see all)

Posted By: j_mindfingerpainter (9/9/2012 12:03:16 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
How can the art be by Glen Angus? He died in 2007:  
http://www.wizards.com/magic/magazine/Article.aspx?x=mtgcom/daily/mc100  
Did they plan to reprint this card so much ahead...?   
I would like to own one of this card only for this reason! Glen Angus was a great artist...  
  
Great card, with a lot of usefulness, but a little less now that power creep affected a lot of small creatures.   
  
4.5/5  
  
@ imsully2:  
I didn't read it (or didn't remember it, more likely...), so thank you very much! Great story behind this art. I'd like they put every version of a card, even promo and token, because I'd like to see them, and because, if so, I would have understand this art.   
  
Also, like you, I still use this card in my Izzet Modern control, and sometimes very useful!

Great card, with a lot of usefulness, but a little less now that power creep affected a lot of small creatures.

4.5/5
